data.actual_result: The Games tab is skipped and you're taken to your bottom DM (or back to your Friends list if you have no DMs)
data.expected_result: You're taken into the Games tab
data.short_description: Alt + upwards arrow doesn't take you into the Games tab
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the Games tab enabled - Go into your Friends list - Press alt + upwards arrow
